thread.title: Woman, 28, arrested for making vile sex tape with two boys aged 12 and 14 in a public toilet
thread.title_full: Woman, 28, arrested for making vile sex tape with two boys aged 12 and 14 in a public toilet

author: hcrouch
title: Woman, 28, arrested for making vile sex tape with two boys aged 12 and 14 in a public toilet
text:
Opinion LOO-D BEHAVIOUR Woman, 28, arrested for making vile sex tape with two boys aged 12 and 14 in a public toilet 
Maria Lynn Baker was arrested on early Saturday morning on two counts of lewd and lascivious battery By Hannah Crouch Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A WOMAN has been arrested for allegedly making a sex tape in a public toilet with a pair of boys aged 12 and 14. 
Police in Florida are horrified at the details of the case. Chris Murphy 1 Maria Lynn Baker has been arrested for allegedly making a sex tape in a public toilet with a pair of boys aged 12 and 14 
NWF Daily News reports an Ocala Police Department detective arrested a 28-year-old woman on suspicion of having sex with a pair of underage boys in a public loo. 
Maria Lynn Baker was arrested on early Saturday morning on two counts of lewd and lascivious battery. 
Some of the evidence is a video recording made by another woman. 
Police were called to an argument when the other woman showed the officer a video of Baker having sex with a boy. 
Detectives were told Baker was having sex with two boys, aged 12 and 14, inside a loo at the War memorial in Silver Springs Boulevard, according to OPD officials. 
Police told NWF Daily News that Baker could face more charges as they believe there could be additional victims. RELATED STORIES The secret life of America's Amish, including including drugs, 'hoedowns' and underage drinking WEB SEX PEST CAGED Woman, 20, jailed after pretending to be a teen girl to get underage boys to send explicit photos to her HORROR LESSON Teacher sacked for showing 18-rated film Halloween to his underage class is awarded £380,000 at tribunal SICK TROOP CHIEF CAGED Paedophile scout leader jailed for 13 years - three decades after molesting underage boys STRIPTEASE SEX ABUSE TRIAL Mum, 38, denies sex with a string of underage boys as she appears in court facing 13 abuse charges 
Last month, a teacher in Utah was accused of filming a sex tape with a teenager after plying him with booze . 
Sarah Lewis, 27, was arrested on suspicion of felony sex with a minor and a misdemeanour of providing alcohol to a minor. 
Lewis reportedly had sex with the 17-year-old boy at her home in Payson, Utah, and gave him vodka and beer. Sick video shows gang attacking a 'Paedophile as he met an underage girl for sex’
